#summary Troubleshooting
= Troubleshooting =

Some commonly encountered technical issues 

* [FAQ_InstallationProblemPleaseReinstallGWT  Installation problem detected, please reinstall GWT]

* [FAQ_UnableToFindModuleInHosted Unable to find type 'com.foo.client.MyApp' when running GWTShell]

* [FAQ_CompilerOutOfMemory OutOfMemoryException from Compiler after upgrading to GWT 1.5]

* [FAQ_FailedToGetGlobalExecState Error launching hosted mode: Failed to getGlobalExecState]

* [FAQ_AssertionElementMayOnlyBeSetOnce AssertionError: Element may only be set once]

* [FAQ_JUnitTestsFailOnMac JUnit Tests fail on Mac]
